value.fullName: Low - No loss of service. The result does not prevent operation
value.label: Low - No loss of service. The result does not prevent operation

value.fullName: Normal - Minor loss of service. Temporary workaround exists
value.label: Normal - Minor loss of service. Temporary workaround exists

value.fullName: High - Severe impact to the business and no workaround exists.
value.label: High - Severe impact to the business and no workaround exists.

value.fullName: Urgent - Complete loss of service or a significant failure, no workaround exists.
value.label: Urgent - Complete loss of service or a significant failure, no workaround exists.
